name: Divine Emperor's Mercy
desc: The Xhan Empire's focus on heavy armor utilizes several active components of ship armor to yield exceptional results. Increase the ship's armor for damage reduction calculation by %s/%s/%s/%s points, depending on hull size.

name: Optimized Targeting Systems
desc: High quality targeting systems and optics extend the range of ballistic and energy weapons by %s.

name: Smart Armor Hardening
desc: Hardened armor has increased damage reduction, making it more effective against low damage projectiles. The hardening process also increases emp resistace by %s.
short: Increases armor damage resistance to lower damage projectiles. Increases EMP resistance

name: Flute Engines
desc: The unique design of UTONA engines increases their durability by %s

name: Plasteen Armor
desc: The ship's armor and internal superstructure is composed of a highly compressible, biologically derived plastic. Increasing resistance to High Explosive damage by %s. However the pliable plasteen construction is %s less reistant to Kinetic damage compared to conventional armor.
short: Increased reistance to HE damage, reduced reistance to kinetic damage.

name: High-Volume DroneShip Constructor
desc: The ship is equipped with an internal bio-synthetic autoforge that will consume %s from ship cargo holds at the end of every month. It will produce %s drone frigates and %s drone frigate. Will not produce ships or consume resources if the required amount is unavailable.
short: Consumes organics to produce drone frigates.

name: Elite DroneShip Constructor
desc: The ship is equipped with an internal bio-synthetic autoforge that will consume %s from ship cargo holds at the end of every month. It will produce %s elite drone frigate. Will not produce ships or consume resources if the required amount is unavailable.
short: Consumes organics to produce a drone frigate.
